title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-4.3 - Owner's responsibility on inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-4.3 - Owner's responsibility on inspection

State Regulations

If in the course of a required inspection it is necessary
to disassemble, reassemble, test, adjust, operate or subject to forcible
handling any part of the boiler, the owner shall provide a competent person to
do so under the supervision of the inspector. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
